english: They'll want your balls for breakfast .
chinese: 他们要咬你几口才解恨呢。

english: He is gifted with rare eloquence .
chinese: 他天生具有罕见的口才。

english: He's got a vocabulary and a punch .
The eloquent auctioneer smiled at his own ingenuity .
chinese: 能说会道的拍卖商对自己的口才十分赏识。

english: For the first time in his life, he must spread himself wordily .
chinese: 有生以来，他还是第一次想卖弄一下口才。
口才造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: A rapid intellect and ready eloquence may carry off a little impudence .
chinese: 头脑敏捷，口才流利，就能减少冒失。

english: Not every writer could command the eloquence of tom praine .
chinese: 以修辞和口才论，很少作家能和汤姆派恩媲美的。

english: I'll admit that now and again he had a sort of tub-thumping eloquence .
chinese: 我承认，他不时地表现出一种慷慨激昂的口才。

english: "you look good on a soapbox, luke," said meggie ironically .
chinese: “卢克，你在临时演说台上倒是口才不错呀。”麦琪嘲讽地说。

english: If you can persuade henry to marry, you must have the address of a french-woman .
chinese: 你要想说服亨利结婚，你得有法国女人的那种口才。

english: Her grace, quickness, her social felicities-seemed the overflow of a bounteous nature .
chinese: 她端庄的仪态，敏捷的反应，伶俐的口才都似乎是多余的了。

english: With his poor gift of expression he gave but indications of what he had gone through .
chinese: 由于他太无口才，他对他自己这一段时间的经历讲得支离破碎。

english: The artful arbaces sought to dazzle the young neapolitan by his treasures and his eloquence .
chinese: 狡猾的阿耳巴克斯企图用他的珠宝和雄辨的口才来迷惑这位那不勒斯少年。

english: Next to arms, eloquence offers the great avenue to popular favor, whether it be in civilized or savage life .
chinese: 不管是在文明社会中，还是在野蛮社会中，除了武力外，口才是取得名望的一个重要手段。

english: As well-judging steady young man, with better notions than his elocution would do justice, he intended to value him very highly .
chinese: 他非常器重他，觉得他是个明白是非，有一定规矩的年轻人，口才虽然谈不上好，但头脑却很清楚。
